data.name: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout
data.detailed_description:
Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout is a mix of every game you love from the SNES, GENESIS and PS1 eras, with a carefully built narrative and art style. It is a charming JRPG about friendship and courage in a dystopian context with new varied mechanics.

A group of people is trapped in a high-tech facility on a tropical island in the year 2147. They need to survive a malicious artificial intelligence system while fighting against dinosaurs and hacked robots.

Explore a vast island with distinct ecosystems and creatures. Mandatory grinding is not essential, but players can enjoy fast-paced strategic combat focused on character traits. You can solve conflicts with either HATE or LOVE strategies and that influences the environment around you. Gameplay possibilities expand as you restore the facilities.

You play as a very distinct group of characters that need to overcome their differences to defeat a common enemy. You must administrate their skills to restore facilities before it is too late. Discover who is the malicious antagonist and escape its traps and puzzles to survive.

Features:
  • Nostalgic atmosphere with an original plot.
  • Explore the secrets of a beautiful living 16-bit world.
  • A turn-based battle system with 7 unique playable characters.
  • Customize characters with an array of weapons and armors.
  • Different areas of the island present distinct ecologies.
  • Hundreds of different beasts for battle (including dinosaurs).
  • The game had scientist consultants to help build animals and flora accurately.
  • Expand gameplay functionalities as you restore each island complex.
  • Gradually updating gameplay with the fishing system, crafting, capture and domesticate system.
  • Mission-focused story with great pacing and intense climaxes.
  • Explore an open world and play as you wish. Do you prefer developing a career as a hunter, a scavenger, or a conservationist?

Impact:
Part of the profits from the sales of DINO HAZARD is destined for scientific research in the field of paleontology, including the study of dinosaur fossils.

data.short_description: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout is a mix of every game you love from the SNES, GENESIS and PS1 eras, with a carefully built narrative and art style. It is a charming JRPG about friendship and courage in a dystopian context with new varied mechanics.
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
data.reviews:
“A respectful RPG. Beautiful art. Amazing music. A nice thrilling story.”
GrindingCast

“Basically this game is a mix of Jurassic Park, Carnivores, Pokémon, Zelda, Earthbound and Undertale.”
Cintrón Productions

“This game has a pretty neat pixel art and setup (...) It deserves a spot for thinking outside of the box.”
Best Indie Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1368x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
